title: User Authentication System
description: Implement a secure user authentication system with email/password login, JWT token management, and password reset functionality.
objectives: Enable secure user login and registration
Ensure security best practices are followed
user_stories: As a user, I want to register with email and password
As a user, I want to login securely and receive a session token
As a user, I want to reset my password if I forget it
As a developer, I want to protect API endpoints with authentication
success_metrics: Zero security vulnerabilities in auth flow
constraints: Must be compatible with existing user database schema
